name: Matar Shooter Pro
description:
Maar Shooter Pro is a 2D Sci Fi based shooter game. Kill enemies as instructed to win.

Enemies will try to stop  you but can you prove them wrong  

Best Of Luck ;)

Sorry for the bugs you may find in this game, actually made my first own game in unity.

Credits:

Game by RitoDev
